title: Chapter 1815 - Seeking Out One’S Own Demise
body:
Chapter 1815 - Seeking Out One’S Own Demise

Qing Wu was stunned, but a moment later, she realized what Jin Zhuliu was getting at.

Gongyang Yu really was going all out, but it wasn’t because his anger had gotten the best of him. Rather, this was a perfectly deliberate move. He wanted to capture Su Yi, the heretic who controlled the power of reincarnation!

When Qing Wu thought about it, it made sense. If they killed Su Yi, they’d have removed an enormous latent threat on the gods’ behalf. Such a meritorious accomplishment would lead to unimaginable benefits!

And if they captured Su Yi alive… the rewards would be even grander!

She didn’t even need to think to know that, should Gongyang Yu succeed, he’d immediately leave the Immortal Realm and return to his clan. When the time came, based on his enormous act of merit, they’d surely reward him with a chance to attain divinity. Moreover, he’d become the most talked about figure in the Immortal Realm! His prospects would be absolutely limitless!

When Qing Wu realized this, even she was tempted. 

But when Su Yi saw what Gongyang Yu was attempting, his eyes flashed with mockery. “You're seeking out your own demise.” 

He’d long since concluded that the Book...
original_title: Chapter 1815 - Seeking Out One’s Own Demise
